With the help of coils through which I channel energy, I can catapult metallic objects. Via a barrel for aiming and targeted alignment of the coils, I can shoot projectiles over great distances.
From experimenting more, I developed an effective weapon. With it, I can tweak acceleration time and speed to precisely reach a target.

Neon energy is required for (re-)charging. When the stored charge is completely exhausted and not replenished, the weapon can no longer accelerate the missiles away from the unit. This can end in an extremely dangerous situation!
